snippet.title: Technotopia - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet the citizens, see gameplay, and the features of Technotopia in this trailer for the upcoming city-builder roguelike card game. A playtest for Technotopia is available now on Steam.

In Technotopia, assume the role of an artificial intelligence tasked with crafting an ideal city that caters to all inhabitants. Construct various districts, address urban dilemmas, fulfill faction requests, and brace yourself for obstacles, all while considering the diverse needs and issues of the populace.
